postText: I'm so excited to be here!
I don't have the heart to tell my owner he's really bad at belly rubs
Who doesn't love treats?! That's a no brainer!
IDK about you, but I can stay home all day.
Grrrrr! I really hope I don't see dorothy at the park!
I hope my owner doesn't notice I made mess in her office...
I just tried to scratch my owner behind the ears. Epic fail!
I can't wait for my sister's pups to be out of my house!
